result.eng: But the blogs that are worth reading are few and far between.
result.ga: Ach tá na blaganna Gaeilge ar fiú iad a léamh tearc go maith
result.orig: Ach tá na blaganna Gaeilge ar fiú iad a léamh tearc go maith
result.html: Ach tá na blaganna Gaeilge ar fiú iad a léamh tearc go maithBut the blogs that are worth reading are few and far between.
result.ponchtml: Aċ tá na blaganna Gaeilge ar fiú iad a léaṁ tearc go maiṫBut the blogs that are worth reading are few and far between.

result.eng: Apart from the odd blog here and there, most of the sites are only rarely updated.
result.ga: Díomaite de chorrbhlag fánach is beag nuashonrú a dhéantar ar fhormhór na suíomhanna
result.orig: Díomaite de chorrbhlag fánach is beag nuashonrú a dhéantar ar fhormhór na suíomhanna
result.html: Díomaite de chorrbhlag fánach is beag nuashonrú a dhéantar ar fhormhór na suíomhannaApart from the odd blog here and there, most of the sites are only rarely updated.
result.ponchtml: Díomaite de ċorrḃlag fánaċ is beag nuaẛonrú a ḋéantar ar ḟorṁór na suíoṁannaApart from the odd blog here and there, most of the sites are only rarely updated.

result.eng: Some writers got very little feedback on their blogs.
result.ga: Is beag aischothú a fuair scríbhneoirí áirithe ar a gcuid blaganna
result.orig: Is beag aischothú a fuair scríbhneoirí áirithe ar a gcuid blaganna
result.html: Is beag aischothú a fuair scríbhneoirí áirithe ar a gcuid blagannaSome writers got very little feedback on their blogs.
result.ponchtml: Is beag aisċoṫú a fuair scríḃneoirí áiriṫe ar a gcuid blagannaSome writers got very little feedback on their blogs.

result.eng: In that context, maybe writing a blog just wasn't worth the trouble.
result.ga: Sa chomhthéacs sin b'fhéidir nárbh fhiú an trioblóid le bheith ag scríobh blag
result.orig: Sa chomhthéacs sin b'fhéidir nárbh fhiú an trioblóid le bheith ag scríobh blag
result.html: Sa chomhthéacs sin b'fhéidir nárbh fhiú an trioblóid le bheith ag scríobh blagIn that context, maybe writing a blog just wasn't worth the trouble.
result.ponchtml: Sa ċoṁṫéacs sin b'ḟéidir nárḃ ḟiú an trioblóid le ḃeiṫ ag scríoḃ blagIn that context, maybe writing a blog just wasn't worth the trouble.

result.eng: The biggest reason why Irish-language blogs have started declining is...
result.ga: An chúis is mó go bhfuil meath tagtha ar bhlaganna na Gaeilge ná
result.orig: An chúis is mó go bhfuil meath tagtha ar bhlaganna na Gaeilge ná
result.html: An chúis is mó go bhfuil meath tagtha ar bhlaganna na Gaeilge náThe biggest reason why Irish-language blogs have started declining is...
result.ponchtml: An ċúis is mó go ḃfuil meaṫ tagṫa ar ḃlaganna na Gaeilge náThe biggest reason why Irish-language blogs have started declining is...

result.eng: You wouldn't expect the same opiniated depth from them as you would from longer posts such as blogs or online columns.
result.ga: Ní bheifeá ag súil leis an doimhneacht chéanna tuairimíochta uathu is a bheadh ó phostálacha níba fhaide ar nós blag nó colún ar líne
result.orig: Ní bheifeá ag súil leis an doimhneacht chéanna tuairimíochta uathu is a bheadh ó phostálacha níba fhaide ar nós blag nó colún ar líne
result.html: Ní bheifeá ag súil leis an doimhneacht chéanna tuairimíochta uathu is a bheadh ó phostálacha níba fhaide ar nós blag nó colún ar líneYou wouldn't expect the same opiniated depth from them as you would from longer posts such as blogs or online columns.
result.ponchtml: Ní ḃeifeá ag súil leis an doiṁneaċt ċéanna tuairimíoċta uaṫu is a ḃeaḋ ó ṗostálaċa níba ḟaide ar nós blag nó colún ar líneYou wouldn't expect the same opiniated depth from them as you would from longer posts such as blogs or online columns.

result.eng: Do you play snooker? No I don't. The odd game of pool in the pub, that's all.
result.ga: An mbíonn tú ag imirt snúcair Ní bhím Corrchluiche púil sa bpub sin an méid
result.orig: An mbíonn tú ag imirt snúcair Ní bhím Corrchluiche púil sa bpub sin an méid
result.html: An mbíonn tú ag imirt snúcair Ní bhím Corrchluiche púil sa bpub sin an méidDo you play snooker? No I don't. The odd game of pool in the pub, that's all.
result.ponchtml: An mbíonn tú ag imirt snúcair Ní ḃím Corrċluiċe púil sa bpub sin an méidDo you play snooker? No I don't. The odd game of pool in the pub, that's all.

result.eng: For a whole week, flights were grounded in the country with only occasional exceptions and, of course, hardly anybody even wanted to fly.
result.ga: Níor ceadaíodh ach correitilt sa tír go ceann seachtaine eile agus ar ndóigh ba bheag duine a bhí ag iarraidh eitilt ach oiread
result.orig: Níor ceadaíodh ach correitilt sa tír go ceann seachtaine eile agus ar ndóigh ba bheag duine a bhí ag iarraidh eitilt ach oiread
result.html: Níor ceadaíodh ach correitilt sa tír go ceann seachtaine eile agus ar ndóigh ba bheag duine a bhí ag iarraidh eitilt ach oireadFor a whole week, flights were grounded in the country with only occasional exceptions and, of course, hardly anybody even wanted to fly.
result.ponchtml: Níor ceadaíoḋ aċ correitilt sa tír go ceann seaċtaine eile agus ar ndóiġ ba ḃeag duine a ḃí ag iarraiḋ eitilt aċ oireadFor a whole week, flights were grounded in the country with only occasional exceptions and, of course, hardly anybody even wanted to fly.
